1: Academic. You are a scholar. You can read and write in one language you know how to speak. You can recall  information related to your area of scholarship.
2: Common. You work in a trade. You can recall information  related to your trade and, if your trade involves manufacturing, you know how to produce goods  related to your trade from raw materials.
3: Criminal. You engage in illegal or illicit activities.
4: Martial. You joined the army, law enforcement, or the local militia.
5: Religious. You belong to a religious institution.
6: Wilderness. You live beyond civilization's bounds
